title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added and the dataset is not set, the user is unable to create a new table group. The group dialog is not displayed.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. The user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a table report item. 2. Do not set the dataset. 3. Try creating a new table group. The group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not set.
